snippet: Alfonse M. D’Amato, a former leader of the state Republican Party, is the biggest financial backer for William C. Thompson Jr. in the New York mayoral race.
abstract: Former leader of New York State Republican Party Alfonse M D'Amato is biggest financial backer for Democrat William C Thompson in race for New York City mayor; unlikely alliance is giving Thompson sorely needed jolt of high-powered fund-raising as he seeks to project energy and momentum in wide-open race for Democratic nomination.

byline.contributor: Al Baker and David W. Chen contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Alfonse M. D’Amato, a former leader of the state Republican Party, is the biggest financial backer for William C. Thompson Jr. in the New York mayoral race.

headline.seo: D’Amato Fund-Raising Prowess Stirs New York Mayoral Race
headline.main: D’Amato Puts Money on Democrat in Race for New York Mayor
headline.print_headline: For New York Mayor, D’Amato Puts His Money on a Democrat
